name: CarImageType
description: Available types of images which can be found for a car. Each type has specific image sizes

enumValues.name: provider
enumValues.description: Images provided by a Car Datasource

enumValues.name: image_thumbnail
enumValues.description: The thumbnail of the full size image at 131x72 px

enumValues.name: brand
enumValues.description: Full size brand (maker) logo at 768x432 px

enumValues.name: brand_thumbnail
enumValues.description: The thumbnail of the full size brand logo at 56x24 px
